title: AR Fitness
description: Collaborating with Imperial and a company called LV8, I and five others created an augmented reality app that allows users to get real-time feedback on their performance in fitness exercises by looking at factors such as posture.

title: Todo
description: A Todo app written with AWS CDK. S3 is used to store static content, Cognito is used for user authentication and API authorisation, API Gateway and Lambda are used to handle API calls, and DynamoDB is used for persistance.

title: Decksy
description: An iOS/Android app built with React Native that allows people to make a customisable digital business card and add other peopleâ€™s cards using a unique QR code. After the conference they can call or message them with the tap of a button.

title: lloydclowes.com
description: My personal website, written with AWS CDK, React and Bootstrap. S3 is used to store the static content, while the CloudFront CDN is used to bring content closer to the user and to redirect HTTP to HTTPS.

title: WACC Compiler
description: A compiler, written in Kotlin, for the internal WACC programming language. The ANTLR4 parsing generator was used to do the tokenisation and parsing of the language.

title: Pintos
description: Added support for a thread system, loading and running user programs, system calls, virtual memory, a MLFQ scheduler and a Priority scheduler to an 80x86 operating system framework, written in C.

title: ARM-11 Assembler and Emulator
description: Built both an ARM emulator, that simulates the execution of an ARM binary file on a Raspberry Pi, and an ARM assembler, that allows a user to translate an ARM assembly source file into a binary file that can subsequently be executed by the emulator. These were coded in C and assembly.

title: CryptoMessenger
description: An end-to-end encrypted messaging app for iOS. The Triple DES block cipher (for symmetric encryption) and the Diffie-Hellman key exchange (for asymmetric encryption) were used to encrypt messages while Google Firebase was used to handle the authentication of users and the database of conversations.
